author: Jaime Botero
releaseNotes:
Beta Release v0.17:
- Fixed 0% efficiency bug for rooms with minimal temperature change
- Debug logging NONE level now properly disables all logs
- DAB Disable Mode - Vents respond to manual control when OFF
- No more 404 errors from missing Flair Pucks
- New setRoomActive command with dropdown UI

WARNING: This is a beta release and may contain bugs. Please report issues on the community forum.
